questions.question: The structure pictured is the Haworth structure of ………

explanations.a: beta-D-glucose is commonly shown in Haworth forms; likely correct if image was shown.
explanations.b: Galactose differs in configuration at C4 from glucose.
explanations.c: Incorrect alpha anomer assumed without image.
explanations.d: Alpha and beta differ in OH orientation at anomeric carbon.

questions.question: Methylene blue is a heterocyclic aromatic chemical compound with the molecular formula ------

explanations.a: Correct molecular formula for methylene blue.
explanations.c: Incorrect, has one extra chlorine atom.
